name: Capsaiciner
description:
This is a story of a man who could strike the most awesome poses and drink the hottest sauces straight from the bottle. Nothing can satisfy his thirst for heat, but there’s a rumor - in the deep bottoms of hell there’s a special fast food truck, that serves stuff which make lava cool in comparison.

With your belly filled with burning determination, your journey is about to begin!

WSAD, Arrows, Space for movement. Enter - pause. Bring on those sweet screenshots! R - quick restart the level. Gamepad supported (Tested on x-box).

🌶️🌶️🌶️
